name: Sacrifiskeleton (LudumDare#43)
description:
Heroes and heroines are about sacrifices. Being a skeleton, this applies when going ahead, “sacrificed”, and becoming the leader’s bone-merangs.

Go sacrificed as a leader, or as ammo leads?

Warning: Because stuffs, this entry is far from the designed complexity… Wish there be no more electricity outs when LD is going
